fields.name: ðŸ”´ Rule 1
fields.value: Don't be toxic - resolve conflicts in DM's.

fields.name: ðŸ”´ Rule 2
fields.value: Don't try to be an edgelord - obnoxious attention seekers aren't welcome.

fields.name: ðŸ”´ Rule 3
fields.value: Don't mic spam - No unwanted ear rape, music spam etc.

fields.name: ðŸ”´ Rule 4
fields.value: Don't post porn/gore - This is against Discord ToS & will result in a ban.

fields.name: ðŸ”´ Rule 5
fields.value: Don't post walls of text/emojis - It's not that hard.

fields.name: ðŸ”´ Rule 6
fields.value: No referrals/spam/link shorteners etc... - Just don't do it.

fields.name: ðŸ”´ Rule 7
fields.value: No doxxing and witch hunts - Illegal and against the Discord Terms of Service.

fields.name: ðŸ”´ Rule 8
fields.value: No encouraging to break any rules on this or other servers - Will result in a single warning followed by ban.

fields.name: ðŸ”´ Rule 9
fields.value: No Discord Invite Links in any Channel (DM's is allowed but only if they ask you personally).

fields.name: ðŸ”´ Rule 11
fields.value: Don't be Racist, Sexist or Homophobic - Calling people racial slurs \"as a joke\" isn't funny.

fields.name: ðŸ”´ Rule 12
fields.value: Don't bring your personal drama or drama related to members of this server - Seriously, we don't wanna see/hear it.

fields.name: ðŸ”´ Rule 13
fields.value: Don't be rude to moderators or other members - if you have an issue or disagree with something, resolve it in DM or talk to a Mod.

fields.name: ðŸ”´ Rule 14
fields.value: Don't bring up ban discussion in the chat and don't message mods asking why someone was kicked/banned Only a person who got affected is allowed to do so.

fields.name: ðŸ”´ Rule 15
fields.value: Plaintext only in usernames/nicknames- Don't have crazy characters in your names, it gives us, other users and the bot a hard time.

fields.name: ðŸ”´ Rule 16
fields.value: Don't try to avoid any of these rules/exploit loopholes.

embeds.title: Thank you for reading the rules.
embeds.description: Rules written by <@288020332336513024>, rules revised and posted by <@180674830264172544>
